com.example.colibris.nsd

Class FileTransferManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.colibris.nsd.FileTransferManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileTransferManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This FileTransferManager class implements the transfer of files (e.g., the connexion graph or the sound)
